name: Charles
description:
Charles!! 111% 4th game!!!
It`s simple but addictive.
Avoid quickly the enemies coming by moving the plane.
It`s not just Dodge. You can kill the enemies with items.
Whose plane will live longer~?
You will be a fantastic player if you avoid more than 5 minutes.

Charles by 111%

Game Features
- You can select many kinds of planes.
- There are dots shaped greetings of some countries.
- Background music is pretty attractive.
- Challenge your friends with GameCenter support.
- Easy and fun to play, but addictive.
- Check facebook page, there is a know-how of high score.
